---
title: cache:view
---

# cache:view

Cache View

Prints stored cache entry by ID.

```sh
n98-magerun2.phar cache:view [options] <id>
```

**Options:**

| Option         | Description                               |
|----------------|-------------------------------------------|
| `--fpc`        | Use full page cache instead of core cache |
| `--unserialize`| Unserialize output                        |
| `--decrypt`    | Decrypt output with encryption key        |
